comments: Capela (ATL) and Porzingis (BOS) pursue the loose ball and marginal arm to arm contact occurs during the rebound.
Murray (ATL) maintains a legal guarding position as he absorbs the marginal contact initiated by Tatum (BOS) during his shot attempt.
Tatum (BOS) reaches across Bogdanovic (ATL) for the ball and initiates more than marginal contact with his right arm.
Tatum (BOS) is drawn into the air on the pump fake toward Hunter (ATL) and is not in a legal guarding position as contact occurs during Hunter's upward shooting motion.
Hunter (ATL) moves alongside Brown (BOS), who leans in to initiate the marginal contact that occurs during his shooting motion.
Krejci (ATL) does not release the in-bounds pass within 5 seconds.

Porzingis (BOS) legally contests Murray's (ATL) jump shot, making "high-five" contact after the ball is released. Following the incidental contact, Murray's legs drift forward and marginal leg to leg contact occurs with Porzingis.
White (BOS) releases the in-bounds pass within 5 seconds.
Matthews (ATL) grabs Tatum's (BOS) off-arm and affects his SQBR on the perimeter.
Tatum (BOS) and Matthews (ATL) briefly engage during the in-bounds play and marginal contact occurs as Tatum releases away.
Bogdanovic (ATL) contests the jump shot attempt and avoids making contact with Tatum's (BOS) arms.
Krejci (ATL) is drawn into the air on the pump fake toward Tatum (BOS) and is not in a legal guarding position as contact occurs during Tatum's upward shooting motion.
Tatum (BOS) and Hunter (ATL) are mutually engaged on the perimeter and Tatum does not lose his balance as a result of any illegal contact initiated by Hunter.
Capela (ATL) and Porzingis (BOS) come together in pursuit of the loose ball and marginal body contact occurs during the rebound.
White (BOS) makes clean contact with the ball and dislodges it away from Murray (ATL) during the drive.
White (BOS) applies a hand to Murray's (ATL) side, causing him to lose his balance.
Holiday (BOS) makes clean contact with the ball and dislodges it away from Murray (ATL) during the drive.
Brown (BOS) is drawn into the air on Matthews' (ATL) pump fake and marginal contact occurs with Matthews' right side during his shot attempt.
White (BOS) ties the ball up in Matthews' (ATL) hands and a jump ball is whistled.
Bogdanovic (ATL) releases the in-bounds pass within 5 seconds.
White (BOS) taps the ball OOB.
Brown (BOS) contests Murray's (ATL) jump shot and the arm and leg contact after the release, and follow-through, is marginal.
Matthews (ATL) briefly reaches in before retracting his hand and avoids making contact with Brown's (BOS) right arm during his upward shooting motion.
White (BOS) and Murray (ATL) briefly come together off-ball during the in-bounds play and marginal body contact occurs;
Holiday (BOS) contests the jump shot attempt and avoids making contact with Murray's (ATL) right arm prior to release.
White (BOS) commits an inbound turnover.
